content: If you close the link settings menu right now, your changes will not be saved.

comment.text: "If you close the link settings menu now, your changes will not be saved." This translation key is used to display a warning message in an unsaved changes dialog when the user attempts to close the link settings menu. It appears as part of the modal dialog's body, prompting users to save their changes before dismissing the dialog.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'لن يتم حفظ التغييرات إذا قمت بإغلاق قائمة الإعدادات الآن.' is a literal translation but lacks the natural flow of Arabic. It sounds somewhat clunky. A more natural way to convey the message would focus on the warning aspect and the potential loss of changes.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: قد تفقد تغييراتك إذا أغلقت قائمة الإعدادات الآن.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "link settings menu" is translated as "meniul cu opțiuni de setare a link-ului". While technically correct, it's a bit clunky. A more natural Romanian translation would be "meniul de setări al link-ului" or simply "meniul de setări".

The translation 'ඔබගේ වෙනස්කම් සුරැකෙන්නේ නැත' could be interpreted as 'your changes will not be saved at all' rather than 'will not be saved *if* you close the link settings menu right now'. A more accurate translation would reflect the conditional nature of the original English.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ඔබ දැන් සබැඳි සැකසුම් වට්ටෝරුව වසා දැමුවහොත්, ඔබගේ වෙනස්කම් සුරැකෙන්නේ නොවනු ඇත.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'подешавање' (setting) is a bit formal and could be replaced with a more common alternative for a user interface.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ако сада затворите мени за подешавања линкова...

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While grammatically correct, 'ваше промене' (your changes) can be slightly improved for flow. A more natural phrasing exists.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ако сада затворите мени за подешавања линкова, промене неће бити сачуване.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation '您所做的更改可能不会被保存' isn't the most natural or concise way to express "your changes will not be saved." While technically correct, it's a bit verbose.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 您所做的更改将不会保存 (Nín suǒ zuò de gēnggǎi jiāng bù huì bǎocún) or 您所做的更改不会保存 (Nín suǒ zuò de gēnggǎi bù huì bǎocún).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not strictly wrong, repeating '您' (Nín) feels slightly formal and a bit clunky in this context. Using '你的' (Nǐ de) might be more conversational.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 如果您现在关闭链接设置菜单，你的更改可能不会被保存。
